Meaning: 'I need someone to get me out of here, it's urgent (fah-fah-fah)'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Mein Handy ist auf lautlos und auf nicht stören
lines.translation: My phone is on silent and do not disturb mode.
lines.grammar: German note: Verb focus: stören (check person/tense and prefixes). V2 word order and separable prefixes; articles show case (der/die/das). Meaning: 'My phone is on silent and do not disturb mode.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Die Sonne geht auf und ich hör die Vögel
lines.translation: The sun rises and I hear the birds.
lines.grammar: German note: Verb focus: geht (check person/tense and prefixes). V2 word order and separable prefixes; articles show case (der/die/das). Meaning: 'The sun rises and I hear the birds.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: (Die Sonne geht auf und ich hör die Vögel)
lines.translation: (The sun rises and I hear the birds)

lines.text: (Ich brauch jemand, der mich rausholt, es ist urgent)
lines.translation: (I need someone to get me out of here, it's urgent)
